variables.name: DB_PORT
variables.description: The port of the database server

variables.name: DB_HOST
variables.description: The database server hostname or ip address

variables.name: JWT_SECRET
variables.description: The JWT secret, just choose a random string

variables.name: MAIL_SERVER_HOST
variables.description: The host of the SMTP Server to use

variables.name: MAIL_SERVER_PORT
variables.description: The port of the SMTP Server to use

variables.name: MAIL_SERVER_USER
variables.description: The user of the SMTP Server to use

variables.name: MAIL_SERVER_PASSWORD
variables.description: The password of the SMTP Server to use

variables.name: MAIL_SENDER_ADDRESS
variables.description: The sender address to use for sending emails.

variables.name: URL
variables.description: The url where AGFree will be available. It must end with a slash.
